long_description: With great value and an easy-to-use design, the Atlas Snowfall 25 snowshoes are perfect for beginners and experienced snowshoers exploring groomed trails and flat terrain. Sturdy frames are crafted from 6063 aluminum to create a stiff, lightweight chassis for lasting use season after season; rounded tails offer good flotation in powder. Easy-to-use ratchet bindings keep feet secure and make it easy to get in and out of the snowshoes at the trailhead. Abrasion-resistant, lightweight Nytex(TM) nylon decks stay flexible when cold and stand up to the elements for lasting use. Steel instep crampons supply sure-footed traction on icy and snowy terrain; heel crampons increase traction while traversing and descending. Atlas Snowfall 25 snowshoes' recommended load specification includes weight of hiker with gear.
short_description: With great value and an easy-to-use design, the Atlas Snowfall 25 snowshoes are perfect for beginners and experienced snowshoers exploring groomed trails and flat terrain.
